thread.title: Michelle Mc Carthy
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by Michelle Mc Carthy

author: Michelle Mc Carthy
title: Michelle Mc Carthy
text: Excellent placed my order on a wed afternoon and I had my order in my hand the very next morning. The courier provider also sent a text to say what time to expect delivery. Also an excellent service as item was delivered within time given. Full 5 stars. Not my first time using lifestyle sports online.
